nodes.text: Camie's Story is a short story written by Grant S. Boucher, originally published in Galaxy Guide 1: A New Hope and The Movie Trilogy Sourcebook. It was later archived on Hyperspace.
Camie Loneozner's recollections of Luke Skywalker and his relationship with Owen and Beru Lars, as told to Alliance to Restore the Republic historian Voren Na'al.
